message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! This is an interesting product, but I'm hoping to find a deal that's within my budget. I'm willing to offer $10000 for it. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. I'm still a bit over budget, but I'm willing to go up to $11000.  This is my final offer, as I'm very close to my limit.

I understand that you're close to your limit, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $12000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11800. This is my final offer. What do you think?
